text.description:
{Wasp Jelly}

At the beginning of every combat this jar lures three swarms of large wasps to your aid.
text.event: You carefully lift the Jar of Wasp Honey, its golden contents shimmering with a strange allure. The faint sound of buzzing fills the air, as if the jar holds the promise of swarms eager to answer your call.
text.name: Wasp Jelly
